title: Maria's Family Christmas
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 353 words, Level L (Grade 2), Lexile 550L, Fiction Series
description: Maria and her family are preparing for Christmas and waiting for their family from Mexico to arrive. Once her family arrives, Maria meets her new cousin, Ruben, for the first time. The family celebrates Christmas by attending church, opening gifts, and eating Christmas dinner. Students will have the opportunity to sequence events and compare their winter holiday celebrations to Maria's as they read this book.
highFrequencyWords: attended, Christmas, decorating, drape, Navidad, relatives
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
